import React from 'react' import css from '../CovidItem/covidItem.module.css' import LatestNews from "../LatestNews/LatestNews"; import { operations } from "../operations/Operations"; const CovidItem = ({maxConfirmed,maxDead,totalRecovered}) => { maxDead.map(cont=>{ operations.getFlag('spain')}) // operations.getFlag('spain') return ( <>

Top Total Cases

    {maxConfirmed.map(country=>(

  • {country.Country}

    Total cases:{country.TotalConfirmed}

    New cases:{country.NewConfirmed}

    Total deaths:{country.TotalDeaths}

    New deaths:{country.NewDeaths}

    Total recovered:{country.TotalRecovered}

    New recovered:{country.NewRecovered}

    • ))}

Top Total Deaths

    {maxDead.map(country=>(

  • {country.Country}

    Total deaths:{country.TotalDeaths}

    New deaths:{country.NewDeaths}

    Total cases:{country.TotalConfirmed}

    New cases:{country.NewConfirmed}

    Total recovered:{country.TotalRecovered}

    New recovered:{country.NewRecovered}

    • ))}

Top Total Recovered

    {totalRecovered.map(country=>(

  • {country.Country}

    Total recovered:{country.TotalRecovered}

    New recovered:{country.NewRecovered}

    Total deaths:{country.TotalDeaths}

    New deaths:{country.NewDeaths}

    Total cases:{country.TotalConfirmed}

    New cases:{country.NewConfirmed}

    • ))}
); }; export default CovidItem;
